DOC.brief_summary: This project aim develop evaluate effectiveness Personalized Normative Feedback ( PNF ) intervention via internet , randomize clinical trial alcohol consumption among Brazilian college student , well evaluate effective component PNF ( normative list consequence ) . The sample compose college student age 18 30 year . Participants allocate four different group : control , full intervention ( PNF ) , feedback normative component ( FN ) feedback list consequence ( FLC ) . The investigator use dismantle design study effective component . Participants followed-up 1 , 3 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Development Evaluation Effectiveness Internet-based Brief Intervention Alcohol Use Among Brazilian College Students
DOC.criteria: College student Age 1830 year Alcohol Use last 3 month
